#summary How to use CoverShare plugin for Song Bird
#labels Featured,Phase-Support


After installing CoverShare plugin and restart your songbird, you need to do following to enable the plugin

http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3293/3115573046_bf3b5d72da_o.jpg


  * First, you need to enable the service pane but click at the small icon on the lower-left of the screen. Look at the picture above, it's pointed by the first arrow.
  * Second, after the service pan is shown, you have to click at another small icon, pointed by second arrow. This icon will show the list of album art providers.
  * Finally, click at CoverShare Album Art to enable the plugin.
